name: Elementiles Temple
description:
Fire beats Water that beats Plant mixed together with discs, tiles and orbs interacting with these rules.

Take orbs to gain points, survive as long as you can and die from all the disc types!

This game has begun with the Disc Room Jam.

Credits: 

Thomas Gonzalez - Technical Game Designer 
Thibaud Bousquet - 2D/3D Artist
